name: PowerCenter:Avoid changing tracing level option other than normal
description: List all transformations where value of tracing level is not "normal"
output:
This report lists all Mappings, Mapplets and Folders with Transformations having level option other than normal.
it provides the following information
Mapping or Mapplet or Folder full name, Transformations full name
rationale: Changing log tracing level should be used only for specific debugging purpose in development environment only. Using a Verbose tracing level can affect performance and disk spaces. Using a Terse tracing level can affect production monitoring effectiveness.
remediation: Let default tracing level value to "normal", except for very specific and controled debugging.
total: Total number of Workflows, Worklets, Mappings and Mapplets

technicalCriteria.name: Programming Practices - Error and Exception Handling
